com.threecubed.auber.entities

Class Npc

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.threecubed.auber.entities.GameEntity
      • com.threecubed.auber.entities.Npc
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Civilian, Infiltrator

    public abstract class Npc
extends GameEntity
    Npc is the class from which all AI controlled GameEntitys must extend. It contains the code that allows for those entities to interact with the NavigationMesh in the pathfinding package, along with handling the state of an entity
    Since:
    1.0

      • handleDestinationReached

        public abstract void handleDestinationReached(World world)
        Handle the event of the NPC reaching its current destination. For Infiltrators this might be to sabotage a system and for Civilians this might be to idle for a bit
